PAI

  • 2020

    The Beginning

    As AI keeps changing our lives, a group of AI ambassadors and evangelists from Stanford and Carnegie Mellon decided to push the frontier of K12 AI education worldwide.

  • 2021

    Keep Growing

    Many K12 students from US、China、Singapore and other Asian countries resonated with PAI’s idea, and started to learn AI.
